sen.j: 縫殿寮（ぬいどのりょう）は律令制日本の律令制における中務省管下の女官人事・裁縫監督機関である。
sen.e: Nuidonoryo is the office which belonged to Chumusho (Ministry of Central affairs) and was in charge of personnel affairs of nyokan (court ladies) as well as the supervision of sewing under the Japanese Ritsuryo system (a system of centralized government based on the Ritsuryo code).
